 2004-02942004-03-25LAB,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisReappointment of DANIEL CHARBONNEAU of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years; and order that DANIEL CHARBONNEAU be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act; effective March 29, 2004.
